Original:
先說結論：可能會建議來公館水岸消費的人，在入座之前要先瞭解各家店的低消規則！

這家店的pizza是真的很不錯，相信店家非常用心製作。但同前面出現過的評論，我跟朋友第一次來沒有弄清楚這邊的潛規則，因此體驗並不是非常好。

因為中間的座位區煙味很重，我們挑了這間在比較旁邊的店家，只買了一人份的pizza就坐下，沒有達到事後被告知的一人250的低消，且拿了另一家的酒水跟食物過來，確實是我們沒有做好，實在是非常抱歉！

我們可以理解或許這麼做的客人很多，導致店家生意被嚴重影響，老闆也可以因為這樣有自己的堅持跟情緒，但不代表我們就應該全盤接受後續老闆態度相當不佳的質疑。

可能會建議店家未來可以考慮在桌子上貼告示（就像其他店的作法），讓消費者入座前充分瞭解這間店的規則，省去老闆需要對客人生氣的情緒勞動，客人也不用承接這份不知所措而壞了飲酒作樂的好心情。
EN:
Let's talk about the conclusion: Those who may be recommended to come to the waterfront of the Mansion may learn about the low -consumption rules of each store before they are seated!

The Pizza of this shop is really good, I believe the store is very careful to make it.But with the comments that appeared earlier, I did not figure out the hidden rules here for the first time, so the experience is not very good.

Because the smoke taste in the middle of the seat is very heavy, we picked this shop next to the comparison, and only bought one person Pizza to sit down. Come with food, it is indeed we did not do well, it's really sorry!

We can understand that there may be many customers who do so, causing the business of the store to be seriously affected. The boss can also have our own persistence and emotions because of this, but it does not mean that we should accept the follow -up boss's attitude.

It may be recommended that the store can consider posting a notice on the table in the future (like the practice of other stores), so that consumers can fully understand the rules of this store before they can take the seat. Unknowingly be overwhelmed, and the good mood of drinking and drinking.

Original:
我最近訪問了這個地方，不幸的是，我的經歷遠非令人愉快。我強烈建議任何人在選擇坐在自己的位置之前三思而後行！

臨近午夜時分，業主的態度變得極其粗魯，巧妙地暗示我們要么加購，要么搬走，營造了一種消極的氛圍。令人震驚的是，工作人員和老闆都沒有提前告知我們每人至少需要250台幣才能佔據一張桌子。

更讓他感到不舒服的是，店主不斷地喋喋不休地談論他因製作披薩而疲憊的肩膀，感嘆新冠病毒大流行期間沒有顧客，並分享了其他個人的不滿。這種不專業的行為不僅破壞了節慶的氣氛，也讓我們感覺自己是不受歡迎的客人。

食物很一般，缺乏我期望的品質和味道。這筆意外的開支，再加上平淡無奇的菜餚，確實為原本應該充滿節日氣氛的夜晚帶來了挫敗感。

總的來說，粗魯的老闆、未公開的最低購買政策和平庸的食物完全毀了我們的心情。我會提醒其他人在選擇坐下來之前要警惕這些因素。
EN:
I recently visited this place. Unfortunately, my experience is far from pleasant.I strongly recommend that anyone thinks before choosing to sit in my own position!

Near midnight, the owner's attitude became extremely rude, and subtly implies that we either buy or move, creating a negative atmosphere.What is shocking is that neither the staff and the boss told us in advance that we need at least 250 Taiwan dollars to occupy a table.

What made him even more uncomfortable was that the owner kept chatting and talking about his tired shoulders that he was tired of making pizza, lamenting that there were no customers during the new crown virus, and shared the dissatisfaction of other individuals.This unprofessional behavior not only destroys the atmosphere of festivals, but also makes us feel that we are unpopular guests.

Food is very average and lacks the quality and taste I expect.This unexpected expenditure, coupled with bland dishes, did bring frustration to the night's atmosphere night.

In general, the rude bosses and unintentional minimum purchase policies have completely ruined our mood.I will remind others to be alert to these factors before choosing to sit down.
